campaign.title: Weekly Specials - Refined Winter Transitions (Jan 27, 2026)
campaign.subject: Transition in Style: Libby, Sofia & Dakota on Special
campaign.notes: Weekly specials newsletter featuring Libby Princess Seam Pullover, Sofia Shawl Collar Sweater, and Dakota Peplum Tunic & Dress. Sale ends Sunday, February 2nd, 2026.
